resources.string: "The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want."
"You are the light of the world."
"I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me."
"I am the way, the truth, and the life."
"Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding."
"Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path."
"But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength."
"And now these three remain: faith, hope, and love. But the greatest of these is love."
"Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find."
"Put on the full armor of God."
"Be still, and know that I am God."
"For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future."
"Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind."
"For we walk by faith, not by sight."
"I lift up my eyes to the mountainsâ€”where does my help come from?"
See more or less information about a bible verse.
Practice the implementation of Jetpack Compose while adhering to Google\'s latest best practices. All illustrations are created independently using Inkscape. All rights reserved. Stay tuned!
